Private Lessons in Scranton, Pennsylvania

How Do Private Lessons Work?

Here is your chance to have a qualified coach help you focus on a particular aspect of your fitness and health. Private lessons can focus on any particular health or fitness goal. Maybe you feel you're not quite ready to join the group classes. Or maybe you're an advanced practitioner looking to go above and beyond the group classes.

A coach will work with you on a one-to-one basis.

The first step is to determine the practitioner's goals. The coach will then develop a training program tailored specifically for the practitioner with their goals in mind. The third step is to develop a training schedule and stick to it!

Once the training program is designed, the coach and the practitioner will work together to find a schedule that works the best for the practitioner and locations to implement program.

Are Private Lessons for me?

Coaching is beneficial to pracitioners of all skill levels. Rarely does one push themselves to their full potential. Having a coach is a valuable asset to your training.

In some cases, private lessons are great for those who want to check their fitness level before joining the group classes.

In other cases, the group classes do not push the practitioner as much as they would like to be pushed. And private lessons are the solution to the pursuit of further knowledge.

Hiring a private coach through Parkour Endure will ensure that you get indiviualized feedback to your training. We guarantee we will help you create a training program that fits you best and push through any plateau you may have reached.

How Do I Start Private Lessons?

Another great thing about private lessons is that they can be tailored to fit your schedule.

You can start private lessons by contacting the head coach, John George. You can find his contact information on the Contact Us page.
